references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, introducing the concept of using stochastic differential equations for generative modeling.
This is a highly influential paper that significantly advanced the field of diffusion models, proposing a practical approach based on denoising score matching.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduced the framework of score-based generative modeling, which is central to the methods discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Efficient integrators for diffusion generative models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Conjugate Integrators framework that is adapted and extended in the target paper for inverse problems.
This paper introduces the flow matching framework that is leveraged as a complementary approach to diffusion models in the target paper.
